meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub that produces fragrant wood used for making candles.
meanings.sent1: The candlewoods in the forest have a sweet smell.
meanings.sent2: I bought a candle made from candlewoods at the market.
meanings.sent3: The candlewoods whispered secrets to the other trees in the woods.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with the comforting scent of candlewoods.
meanings.sent5: The flickering light of the candlewoods created a cozy atmosphere in the room.

meanings.definition: A candle made from the wood of the candlewood tree.
meanings.sent1: She lit a candlewoods to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent2: The candlewoods burned slowly, filling the room with a warm glow.
meanings.sent3: The candlewoods danced in the darkness, casting playful shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The flickering flame of the candlewoods seemed to chase away the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the candlewoods brought back memories of cozy evenings by the fireplace.

meanings.definition: The wood of the candlewood tree used for making candles.
meanings.sent1: The candlewoods were harvested carefully to preserve their quality.
meanings.sent2: Craftsmen carved intricate designs into the candlewoods for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a piece of candlewoods to build its nest.
meanings.sent4: The candlewoods glowed softly as the evening light faded.
meanings.sent5: The candlewoods crackled and popped as they burned, releasing a soothing aroma.
